projects.name: Book Lovers
projects.description: Book Lovers is an application that lets users search for a book based on author, title, subject, and genre.

projects.name: Take My Recipe
projects.description: Take My Recipe is built entirely from JavaScript. Its purpose is to allow users to add recipe for others try out.
projects.langauge: Node.js, Express.js, Handlebars.js, MySQL, Sequelize ORM, uiKIT, JavaScript

projects.name: Will I Need an Umbrella?
projects.description: Weather Application that shows users Temp, Wind, and Humidity based on user search. Users can search the desired city and 5-day forecast will be displayed. Great application to use to plan trips.
projects.langauge: Node.js, Express.js, Handlebars.js, MySQL, Sequelize ORM, uiKIT, JavaScript

projects.name: Taskmaster Pro
projects.description: Taskmaster Pro is a new way to manage tasks seamlessly. Users simply add a task, edit the existing tasks by clicking on the task itself to edit. All the changes are saved even when the browser is closed.
projects.langauge: Node.js, Express.js, Handlebars.js, MySQL, Sequelize ORM, uiKIT, JavaScript

projects.name: Team Profile Generator
projects.description: Command-line application that takes in information about employees on a software engineering team and generates an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person.
projects.langauge: Node.js, Express.js, Handlebars.js, MySQL, Sequelize ORM, uiKIT, JavaScript

projects.name: Social Space Web
projects.description: Social Space Web is a marketing agency. My responsibility was to built a website that showcases who they are, services they provide, and how to contact them.
projects.langauge: Node.js, Express.js, Handlebars.js, MySQL, Sequelize ORM, uiKIT, JavaScript
